name: Mistwar
description:
A tactical map for World VS. World to track objectives, their timers and territory control.

Note: A borderland map will be downloaded the very first time you join it with the module enabled.
An image file of a map can be up to 23,2MB in size (eg. Desert Borderlands).
It will be saved on your hard disk in a registered module folder under your Blish HUD settings directory for future usage.

account.details: Required to get the current match your guild alliance is participating in.
